view.utility

Class PlayerOptionPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JOptionPane
            • view.utility.AbstractInputPane
              • view.utility.PlayerOptionPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class PlayerOptionPane
extends AbstractInputPane
    Utility class to receive player details as input and display player related dialogs.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addPlayerPrompt

        public static Player addPlayerPrompt()
        Prompt the user to insert the details for the player to be added.
        Returns:
        the Player created from the user input, null if the prompt was closed/cancelled

      • playerAddedDialog

        public static void playerAddedDialog(Player player)

        player - the Player who was added

        Parameters:
        players - the collection of players to be kicked
